com.camerontec.catalys.server.processor

Interface IMessageProcessorEventTransformer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultJMSTransformer, MQTransformer, SocketAdapterRawTransformer, TIBRVNameTransformer, TIBRVRawTransformer, TIBRVTransformer

    public interface IMessageProcessorEventTransformer
    This interface is used to define construction methods for message processor event messages.

    Note all these methods receive the MessageEvent object which contains the following information:

    • The source of the event. This will be a Session or SessionManager object. The parties associated with this event as well as all other information can be accessed from these event source objects.
    • The special message containing the event information. See below for a list of these messages. Normally you will not need to access these messages because the relevant information contained they contain is passed for convenience as additional (redundant) parameters.

    The source of the event can be determined with code like the following: 

       Object source = event.getSource();
   if (source instanceof Session) {
       ...
   } else if (source instanceof SessionManager) {
       ...
   }

    The special event information messages are:

    • ConnectionStatusMessage
    • ExceptionMessage
    • ResetMessage

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Object toConnectionStatusMessage(MessageEvent event, boolean connected)
      Transform connection status information into an event message.
      Object toExceptionMessage(MessageEvent event, Exception exception)
      Transform an exception into an event message.
      Object toResetMessage(MessageEvent event)
      Create a reset event message.

    • Method Detail

      • toConnectionStatusMessage

        Object toConnectionStatusMessage(MessageEvent event,
                                 boolean connected)
        Transform connection status information into an event message.
        Parameters:
        event - Message processor event which contains the ConnectionStatusMessage.
        connected - whether or not a connection has been established.
        Returns:
        an object representing the connection status event message.

      • toExceptionMessage

        Object toExceptionMessage(MessageEvent event,
                          Exception exception)
        Transform an exception into an event message.
        Parameters:
        event - Message processor event which contains the ExceptionMessage.
        exception - the exception associated with the event.
        Returns:
        an object representing the exception event message.

      • toResetMessage

        Object toResetMessage(MessageEvent event)
        Create a reset event message.
        Parameters:
        event - Message processor event which contains the ResetMessage.
        Returns:
        an object representing a reset event message.
